title: Mohammed bin Salman - Wikipedia
snippet: In December 2022, Saudi Arabia's Education and Training Evaluation Commission (ETEC) declared a governmental ban on Muslim female students from wearing the traditional abaya clothing to examination centres, insisting that students should wear only school uniforms. A later clarification from ETEC reported by The Milli Chronicle stated that the ban on abayas was restricted only for all-female examination centres run by the ETEC. Mohammed took the leadership in the restructuring of Saudi Arabia's economy, which he officially announced in April 2016 when he introduced Vision 2030, the country's strategic orientation for the next 15 years.

title: Mohammed Bin Salman | The Visionary Leader Transforming Saudi Arabia
snippet: In 2025, Mohammed Bin Salman turns 40. Despite his youth, he has already spent a decade steering Saudi Arabia’s Vision 2030, balancing tradition with progress while leading the Kingdom through a period of rapid growth.
